content: David Praises the Lord for Rescuing Him.

To the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David, the servant of the , who spoke the words of this song to the  on the day when the  rescued him from the hand of all his enemies and from the hand of Saul. And he said:
The  is my rock, my fortress, and the One who rescues me;
My God, my rock  strength in whom I trust  take refuge;
My shield, and the horn of my salvation, my high towerâ€”my stronghold.
I call upon the , who is worthy to be praised;
And I am saved from my enemies.
